column2: OTE: The variables in this section are recoded variables that were created from one or more of the edited or imputed variables from the preceding
OTE: Certain source variables that were used to create recoded variables have valid values that might not have been reported or assigned for the
current survey year. However, these values have been included in the general specifications in the codebook on how the recoded variables were
created. See additional details about this issue in the Organization of the Data File section of this codebook introduction.
OTE: The following 16 variables are among all adult respondents who were asked the respective questions and are not confined to those
respondents who were ultimately classified as having a Major Depressive Episode (MDE) in their lifetime or past year. To produce estimates
among adults with MDE, the analysis will need to be restricted by either the lifetime MDE variable (IRAMDELT) or the past year MDE variable
Len : 1    RC-ADULT: SAW/TALK TO MD/PROF ABT DEPRESSIVE FEELNGS IN PY
Len : 1    RC-ADULT: USED RX MEDICATION FOR DEPRESSIVE FEELINGS IN PY
he following variable, AMDETXRX, is defined as having received treatment/counseling for MDE in the past year if (1) saw or talked to a medical

column1: <s>doctor or other professional about depressive feelings or (2) used prescription medication for depressive feelings.</s>
